A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I honestly can't believe what my eye's just witnessed... 
This is the worst Star Wars film I've EVER seen!!!
When the film came to a close I was left with so many unanswered questions. I'm sad to say that any true Star Wars fan will hate this film.
Disney has 100% taken a most beloved franchise and absolutely killed it!
I can now see why Mark Hamill hates The Last Jedi. Luke Skywalker wasn't Luke Skywalker at all!!! 
Thanks for killing one of my all time favorite movie franchises.
